channel.title: +kANe HoD on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +kANe HoD on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.description: HISTORY OF DHARMAŚĀSTRA (ANCIENT AND MEDIÆVAL RELIGIOUS AND CIVIL LAW IN INDIA) BY Mabamahopādhyāya PANDURANG VAMAN/KANE, M, A., LL, M., D. Litt. (All., Poona ). National Professor of lodology ; Senior Advocate, Supreme Court of India and Advocate High Court, Bombay'; Follow of the Bombay Asiatic Society, of the Asiatic Society of Bengal and of the London School of Oriental and African Studies. VOL. V (PART II) (Santis; Purāṇas and Dharmaśāstra; Tantras and Dharmafāstra ;
